titlestmt.titleproper: Samuel Booth Sturgis genealogical research materials 1909-1976
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Samuel Booth Sturgis genealogical research materials
did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of genealogical research materials for the Sturgis and related families. Materials include correspondence with fellow researchers and family members, extracts from and copies of records such as wills, a number of family photographs, clippings, and notes. There are also a few narrative family histories, including a published history titled The Descendants of Nath'l Russell Sturgis from 1925.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
